document_data.name: Bloodwater
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bloodwater''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s in [[Ser√¥s]].
document_data.Effects: This spell created an expanding zone of blood, within an area of {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} radius. This spell could trigger the natural blood frenzy of some sea creatures such as [[shark]]s or [[sahuagin]]. If triggered, the frenzied creature began attacking any creature near it, whether friend or foe. It could only be cast in water.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]] in the form of a drop of blood.
